item.title: [WIL] 7월 4주차
item.description: SQL safe update mode error Error Code: 1175. You are using safe update mode and you tried to update a table without a WHERE that uses a KEY column. To disable safe mode, toggle the option in Preferences -> SQL Editor and reconnect. 하나의 레코드만을 update, delete 하도록 설정 된 모드인데 다수의 레코드를
